subject: Kind Reminder:: CFP:: 2nd WCIT2014- Kuala Lumpur- Malaysia
from: "The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014)" <donotreply@dcmrf.net>
body:
+-----------------------------------------------------------+
| Please accept our apology for multiple posting. THANK YOU |
+-----------------------------------------------------------+

           --------------------------------------------
           C A L L  F O R  R E S E A R C H  P A P E R S

    The Second World Congress on Computing and Information 
                        Technology (WCIT2014)  
     Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation (APU)
                       Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
                         March 18-20, 2014
            http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/wcit2014/

--------------------------------------------
The Society of Digital Information and Wireless Communications (SDIWC) would like to invite you to participate in The Second World Congress on Computing and Information Technology (WCIT2014) conferences that will be held at the Asia Pacific University of Technology and Innovation (APU), Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, from March 18-20, 2014. Please consider submitting a paper to them. THANK YOU in advance 

+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The Second International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2014) 
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/ebw2014/ 
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The Second International Conference on Technological Advances in Electrical, Electronics and Computer Engineering (TAEECE2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/taeece2014/ 
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The Third International Conference on E-Learning and E-Technologies in Education (ICEEE2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/iceee2014/ 
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The Second International Conference on Green Computing, Technology and Innovation (ICGCTI2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icgcti2014/ 
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The International Conference on Game-Theory, Development, and Applications (ICGTDA2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icgtda2014/ 
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The Fourth International Conference on Digital Information Processing and Communications (ICDIPC 2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/icdipc2014/
+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-+-+-++-+-+-
The International Conference on Computer Security and Digital Investigation (ComSec2014)
http://sdiwc.net/conferences/2014/comsec2014/


Researchers are encouraged to submit their work electronically. All papers will be fully refereed by a minimum of two specialized referees. Before final acceptance, all referees comments must be considered.


Important Dates
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Submission Deadline:	    Feb. 18, 2014
Notification of Acceptance: March 04, 2014
Camera Ready Submission:    March 08, 2014
Last Day for Registration:  March 08, 2014
Conference Dates:	    March 18-20, 2014

----------------------------------------

If you want to unsubscribe to this mail message from SDIWC, just follow this link http://dcmrf.net/Filemailer2/sdiwc-mailer/unsubscribe.php?id=65b73db1921a24fbe97786870799ab0b
